name: Tiled Background
description: Tile an image over an area. Tiled Backgrounds are faster than tiling Sprites.

conditions.name: On image URL loaded
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load image from URL' when the image has finished loading.

conditions.name: On image URL failed
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load image from URL' if the image fails to load.
conditions.display_text: On image URL failed to load

conditions.name: Is tile randomization enabled
conditions.description: True if tile randomization is currently enabled.

actions.name: Set blend mode
actions.description: Set the background blend mode for this object.

params.name: Blend mode
params.description: Choose the new blend mode for this object.

actions.name: Load image from URL
actions.description: Load an image from a web address or data URI.

params.name: URI
params.description: Enter the URL on the web, or data URI, of an image to load.

params.name: Cross-origin
params.description: The cross-origin (CORS) mode to use for the request.

actions.name: Set image X offset
actions.description: Set the X offset of the image within the object.

params.name: X offset
params.description: The X offset of the image within the object, in pixels.

actions.name: Set image Y offset
actions.description: Set the Y offset of the image within the object.

params.name: Y offset
params.description: The Y offset of the image within the object, in pixels.

actions.name: Set image X scale
actions.description: Set the X scale of the image within the object.

params.name: X scale
params.description: The X scale of the image within the object, as a percentage.

actions.name: Set image Y scale
actions.description: Set the Y scale of the image within the object.

params.name: Y scale
params.description: The Y scale of the image within the object, as a percentage.

actions.name: Set image angle
actions.description: Set the angle of the image within the object.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle of the image within the object, in degrees.

actions.name: Set tile randomization enabled
actions.description: Set whether tile randomization is enabled.

params.name: Enabled
params.description: Whether to enable or disable tile randomization.

actions.name: Set position random
actions.description: Set the amount of horizontal and vertical randomness for tile randomization.

params.name: X random
params.description: Amount of horizontal randomness, from 0 to 100.

params.name: Y random
params.description: Amount of vertical randomness, from 0 to 100.

actions.name: Set angle random
actions.description: Set the amount of angle randomness for tile randomization.

params.name: Angle random
params.description: Amount of angle randomness, from 0 to 100.

actions.name: Set tile blend margin
actions.description: Set the percentage of the tile that fades to adjacent tile.

params.name: Blend margin X
params.description: Percentage of tile width that fades to adjacent tile, 0-100.

params.name: Blend margin Y
params.description: Percentage of tile height that fades to adjacent tile, 0-100.

expressions.name: ImageWidth
expressions.description: The width of the current image, in pixels.

expressions.name: ImageHeight
expressions.description: The height of the current image, in pixels.

expressions.name: ImageOffsetX
expressions.description: The X offset of the image within the object, in pixels.

expressions.name: ImageOffsetY
expressions.description: The Y offset of the image within the object, in pixels.

expressions.name: ImageScaleX
expressions.description: The X scale of the image within the object.

expressions.name: ImageScaleY
expressions.description: The Y scale of the image within the object.

expressions.name: ImageAngle
expressions.description: The angle of the image within the object, in degrees.

expressions.name: TileBlendMarginX
expressions.description: The tile randomization horizontal blend margin, 0-100.

expressions.name: TileBlendMarginY
expressions.description: The tile randomization vertical blend margin, 0-100.
